desc: Kumeu River has been built on generations of hard work, belief, and a commitment to producing a world-class wine. Our Single Vineyard and Estate Chardonnays are consistently held up as some of the finest examples produced in New Zealand. Founded in 1944.

layout.text: Kumeu River Single Vineyard 2021 Vintage Release.
"I've never seen a run of vintages of this quality before." - Michael Brajkovich on his 40th Vintage.
